exercise.notImplemented: Exercise type "{type}" is not yet implemented.
noExercisesFoundDesc: Try adjusting your filters or browse all exercises
testSectionDesc: Test i18n system features and showcase translations
testI18n.pageDescription: This page showcases the i18n system features and different translation scenarios
testI18n.scenarios.basic.title: Basic Translation
testI18n.scenarios.basic.description: Simple key-value translations that change with the current UI language
testI18n.scenarios.basic.sampleText: This is a sample text that will be translated
testI18n.scenarios.basic.multilineText:
This is a multiline text example.
It spans multiple lines
and demonstrates how the i18n system handles longer content.
testI18n.scenarios.missing.title: Missing Translation Handling
testI18n.scenarios.missing.description: How the system handles missing translation keys with different policies
testI18n.scenarios.missing.missingKey: This key does not exist in translations
testI18n.scenarios.status.title: Translation Status
testI18n.scenarios.status.description: Shows the current status of translation loading and processing
testI18n.scenarios.fixed.title: Fixed Language Keys
testI18n.scenarios.fixed.description: Keys that remain in a specific language regardless of UI language setting
testI18n.scenarios.unicode.title: Unicode Support
testI18n.scenarios.unicode.description: Demonstration of Unicode character handling across different scripts
testI18n.scenarios.unicode.greekSample: Γεια σας! Καλώς ήρθατε στην Ελλάδα 🇬🇷
testI18n.demo.welcome: Welcome to the i18n system demonstration page.
testI18n.demo.instructions: Switch languages using the controls above to see how translations change dynamically.
